mapper.select: SELECT psa.*, psav.*, psa.id AS psa_id, psav.id AS psav_id, IF ( ssav.sku_id, 1, 0 ) AS isChecked FROM pms_product_sale_attr psa INNER JOIN pms_product_sale_attr_value psav ON psa.product_id = psav.product_id AND psa.sale_attr_id = psav.sale_attr_id AND psa.product_id =#{productId} LEFT JOIN pms_sku_sale_attr_value ssav ON ssav.sale_attr_id = psa.sale_attr_id AND ssav.sale_attr_value_id = psav.id AND ssav.sku_id =#{skuId} ORDER BY psav_id
SELECT psi.*,psav.*,psi.id as psi_id ,psav.id as psav_id FROM pms_sku_info psi INNER JOIN pms_sku_sale_attr_value psav ON psi.id = psav.sku_id AND psi.product_id = #{productId}
